title: NENC/America Amplified Special: Lessons Lost: The Struggle To Talk About Race In Some New England Classrooms
itunes:title: NENC/America Amplified Special: Lessons Lost: The Struggle To Talk About Race In Some New England Classrooms
description:
What we don’t learn in school can matter as much as the lessons we do learn. This week on NEXT, we talk to teachers and students about the harm of omitting stories and cultures from curricula — and how we can do better. It's a rebroadcast from our series of specials on “Racism in New England,” produced by the New England News Collaborative and America Amplified. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
